data.title: Ultimate in Relaxation
data.text: Everything about this spa is wonderful.  From the time you enter the spa until the moment you leave,  you cannot help but relax and feel great.  I had a 2 hour treatment which is one of the best I have ever experienced.  The staff are warm, friendly yet totally professional.  And the treatment was outstanding, using nothing but Guerlain products.  When in Miami, you can be sure I will be a regular.

data.title: Best Spa in Miami......
data.text:
coming from oversea, I had booked the 2 hour Exceptional Orchidee Imperial Treatment which is the true specialty of that Spa. I have to say that this was a wonderful experience, being pampered for 2 hours with the finest skin care products of the world (they use only Guerlain products) ....the facial actually includes a small hand and a foot massage... and all topped with the complimentary foot bath 

They have amazing good therapists there, all of that was confirmed by a colleague who had the same treatment before

This is one of the Spas I will definetely enjoy again
